com.azure.core.util.configuration

Class BaseConfigurations

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.azure.core.util.configuration.BaseConfigurations

  • public final class BaseConfigurations
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the well-known, commonly expected, environment variables.
